message: Hello Bob, it's a pleasure to connect with you. I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price is more in line with the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,200,000 is significantly below my minimum.  To move this forward, I can offer the product for $1,350,000. This represents a significant concession on my end while still reflecting the true value of this product.
I appreciate your concession, but $1,350,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
